channel.title: PC on uweb browser: unlimited power
channel.description: Recent content in PC on uweb browser: unlimited power

item.title: Text selection/processing
item.description: Click the following links to install menus for long pressing the button "link": Copy selected text with html format to clipboard Search with home screen google Translate bing translate deepL The file "default.select" defines text processing menus for selected text. If no text is selected, the menu item operates on the whole page. Each line of the file has the following format: [Name]:[mimetype]:[command line] [mimetype] specifies input/output for [command line].
